backend/main.mo: Defines core types, user/admin state, watchlists, alerts, and command registry for the Motoko backend with access control and symbol management.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for documentation or analysis.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing identity, routing, profile setup, and navigation between dashboard and backend tester.
Dialog for selecting and adding a cryptocurrency to the user's watchlist with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: Entry button for Backend Tester with admin check, loading/error states, and limited-mode access for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty or placeholder file for a configuration-related error boundary component.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Manages authentication, actor initialization, and timeout handling, showing loading or error states and allowing retries or re-authentication.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Expandable debug panel displaying connection and authentication diagnostic fields with copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty file or placeholder for a future recovery dialog component.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Displays live crypto market data with loading, error, and registration handling, and opens a detail dialog on interaction.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Dialog showing forecast chart and settings for a selected cryptocurrency with per-session state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer with branding and a risk disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Generates mock historical data, computes forecasts and indicators, and renders a detailed chart for a crypto symbol.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: Provides sliders and controls for adjusting moving average period and forecast horizon parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, authentication handling, user registration, and optional backend tester entry.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login prompt showing platform features and a button to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Simulated command-line panel with backend command execution, reconnection logic, and admin access checks.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: UI for displaying, adding, and removing cryptocurrencies from the user's watchlist.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: Displays live price data for each watchlist entry with loading, error, and formatted price states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Extends useActor with authentication diagnostics, timeout handling, and admin‑init retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty placeholder file for future connection recovery logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an auth context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin actions, and other backend operations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light and dark theme tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: Admin and diagnostics page showing identity, role, and backend access status with testing utilities.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing watchlist, market data, and entry point to backend tester.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines command metadata and execution logic for the Backend Tester panel, including registration, connectivity, diagnostics, and admin actions calling backend actor methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, and development focus for an ICP React + Motoko application.
